title: 8-year-old boy accidentally shot by 10-year-old on Cleveland's West Side
content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A 10-year-old boy accidentally shot an 8-year-old boy as they played with a gun on Cleveland's West Side, police said.
The shooting happened about 2:45 p.m. Saturday on West 120th Street and Lorain Avenue.
The boys found a gun in the home and were playing with it, police said. The gun went off and the 8-year-old suffered a gunshot wound to the upper left shoulder.
He was taken to Fairview Hospital in stable condition, police said.
A man could be cited for failing to secure a gun, according to police. Cleveland police are still at the scene investigating the incident.
